Parameters.Name: RECORDING-2-1-17 MODIFY MEDIA ATTRIBUTE WHILE RECORDING - MEDIA PROFILE

Test.TestName: MODIFY MEDIA ATTRIBUTE WHILE RECORDING - MEDIA PROFILE
Test.Name: Correct response: H264 encoding
Test.TestSummary:
RECORDING-2-1-17 MODIFY MEDIA ATTRIBUTE WHILE RECORDING - MEDIA PROFILE
STEP 1 - Get Recording Service address Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Connect to Recording service Recording service address: http://localhost:17934/ServiceRecording10/RecordingService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Get Media service address Transmit done Receive done Media service address: http://localhost:17934/ServiceMedia10/MediaService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Get Service Capabilities Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Create recording Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Get Recording Options (token = 'recording001') Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED

STEP 11 - Validate CurrentTime and TerminationTime STEP PASSED
STEP 12 - Check if the DUT returned SubscriptionReference STEP PASSED
STEP 13 - Check if SubscriptionReference contains address STEP PASSED
STEP 14 - Check that URL specified is valid STEP PASSED
STEP 15 - Create recording job Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 16 - Check that job token was returned STEP PASSED
STEP 17 - Validate recording job configuration STEP PASSED
Send PullMessages requests until an event with topic="tns1:RecordingConfig/JobState", 'RecordingJobToken' Simple Item with value='job001' and 'State' Simple Item with value='Active' is received
STEP 18 - Send PullMessages request Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 19 - Validate CurrentTime and TerminationTime STEP PASSED
STEP 20 - Check that a maximum number of 1 Notification Messages is included in PullMessagesResponse STEP PASSED
STEP 21 - Response is not empty STEP PASSED
STEP 22 - Check that the message with requested topic has been received so far STEP PASSED
STEP 23 - Validate Messages STEP PASSED
STEP 24 - Check that notification message contains only one well-formed ElementItem STEP PASSED
STEP 25 - Check that ElementItem content is correct STEP PASSED
STEP 26 - Parse ElementItem content STEP PASSED
STEP 27 - Validate RecordingJobStateInformation STEP PASSED
STEP 28 - Get Recording Job State (token = 'job001') Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 29 - Validate RecordingJobStateInformation STEP PASSED
STEP 30 - Get Media profile (token = 'media_profile2') Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 31 - Check profile STEP PASSED
STEP 32 - Get video encoder configuration options (profile token = 'media_profile2') Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 33 - Check options STEP PASSED
STEP 34 - Set Video Encoder Configuration Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 35 - Get Video Encoder Configuration Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 36 - Verify video encoder configuration STEP PASSED
STEP 37 - Get Recording Job State (token = 'job001') Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 38 - Validate RecordingJobStateInformation STEP PASSED
STEP 39 - Delete Recording Job (jobToken = 'job001') Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 40 - Delete recording 'recording001' Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 41 - Send Unsubscribe request Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 42 - Set Video Encoder Configuration Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED

Test.TestName: MODIFY MEDIA ATTRIBUTE WHILE RECORDING - MEDIA PROFILE
Test.Name: Correct response: only Resolution is applaied
Test.Description: The test tool cahges all VEC parameters: Resulution, BitRateLimit, FrameRateLimit, Quality. The DUT changed only Resolution (it is correct behaviour according to 539 ticket). Other parameters are kept old..

Test.TestName: MODIFY MEDIA ATTRIBUTE WHILE RECORDING - MEDIA PROFILE
Test.Name: Correct response: only Resolution is applaied
Test.Description: The test tool cahges all VEC parameters: Resulution, BitRateLimit, FrameRateLimit, Quality. The DUT changed only Resolution (it is correct behaviour according to 539 ticket). Other parameters are updated to different from set and from old values.
